articles.title: Thakor given six-month ECB ban after indecent exposure
articles.description: Shiv Thakor will not return to cricket in England for at least a year after admitting a charge of bringing the game into disrepute

articles.title: Peshawar into PSL knockouts with Akmal 107*
articles.description: Peshawar Zalmi piggy-backed on Kamran Akmal's fourth T20 century, his second fifty-plus score in as many days to brush aside Lahore Qalandar by seven wickets and storm into the Playoffs

articles.title: Graves under pressure as counties win emergency meeting
articles.description: Fear grows about emergence of eight 'Super Counties' as the row over compensation to Test match grounds intensifies

articles.title: Rupganj climb to second spot; Kalabagan languish at bottom
articles.description: A six-wicket win over Mohammedan Sporting Club took Khelaghar Samaj Kallyan Samity to fourth place with a genuine shot at getting a Super-League place

articles.title: KKR rope in Streak as bowling coach
articles.description: The former Zimbabwe captain replaces Lakshmipathy Balaji, who has taken up a similar role with Chennai Super Kings

articles.title: Wankhade 99* powers Vidarbha after Jaffer 286
articles.description: Read more on ESPN

articles.title: Bangladesh bowl, Shakib in for Abu Hider
articles.description: Chasing sides have won all but one game in the the tournament so far, but Sri Lanka captain Thisara Perera suggested that his side had actually wanted to bat first

articles.title: Devine, Satterthwaite, Martin thrash West Indies
articles.description: Sophie Devine's 3 for 12, Amy Satterthwaite's unbeaten 71, and Katey Martin's 65 gave New Zealand a 2-0 lead in the T20I series against West Indies in Mount Maunganui

articles.title: Rabada's appeal hearing on March 19
articles.description: The judicial commissioner, Michael Heron, will have 48 hours to reach a decision. If cleared, the fast bowler could play in the Newlands Test that starts on Friday

articles.title: Sikandar Raza's 69* rallies Zimbabwe to 211
articles.description: The batsman overcame a slow pitch and disciplined attack to haul the hosts from 139 for 7 to 211 for 9

articles.title: Western Australia leave South Australia facing a mountain
articles.description: An unbeaten century from Hilton Cartwright has helped Western Australia set a near impossible fourth-innings chase for South Australia

articles.title: Broad faces losing new ball for New Zealand Tests
articles.description: James Anderson, his long-time new-ball partner, has said Broad is "disappointed" but also sees a bowler refreshed and hungry after the Ashes

articles.title: Labuschagne ton steers Queensland out of trouble
articles.description: Matt Renshaw subbed out under the concussion rule following a head knock during warm-ups; move made as a precaution, despite the blow not being too severe

articles.title: Fekete bowls Tasmania into Shield final
articles.description: Tasmania dethroned three-time defending champions Victoria to face Queensland in their first Sheffield Shield final in five years

articles.title: Axed Akmal's Lahore Qalandars future in doubt
articles.description: It is understood that the batsman has not even been travelling to the stadium ever since he was dropped from the side following a poor run in the tournament

articles.title: Can we turn the stump mics down, please?
articles.description: Why all the talk about bad language on the field is overblown

articles.title: ICC upholds Mirpur pitch's sanctions
articles.description: The track at the Shere Bangla National Stadium was rated below-average after the Sri Lanka Test in February, fetching it one demerit point, and the BCB had appealed that decision

articles.title: Starc reveals conflict over Smith instructions on de Villiers - ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: ESPNcricinfo.com Starc reveals conflict over Smith instructions on de Villiers ESPNcricinfo.com Good enough to have Australia's captain Steven Smith instruct Mitchell Starc, arguably the world's fastest bowler, to fire balls deliberately down the leg side in â€¦

articles.title: Starc reveals de Villiers conflict with Smith
articles.description: The Australia fast bowler said his captain had told him to take a highly negative approach in his bowling to AB de Villiers during the Port Elizabeth Test

articles.title: CoA blocks all powers of the BCCI's office bearers
articles.description: The CoA said that it was forced to issue the fresh directive because of the "difficulties" being created by the current set of office bearers
